title: Dice Roller
headline: Roll the dice you need
description: Quickly roll dice for board games, meetings, or quick decisions and share the result.
helper: Set the number of sides and dice count, then roll instantly (e.g., d6, d20).

messages.invalidSides: Enter a side count between 2 and 1000.
messages.invalidCount: Enter a dice count between 1 and 20.
messages.notePlaceholder: Your roll results will appear here too.

openGraph.title: Dice Roller
openGraph.description: Roll any dice online with custom sides and counts. Get instant results for games, meetings, or quick decisions.
